title: abeec 32 Glitter Glue Pens for Kids - 10ml Coloured Glitter Tubes |Craft Supplies for Children | Arts & Crafts, Card Making, Non-Toxic, Easy to Use
features: 32 Vibrant Glitter Glue Pens: Includes 32 x 10ml tubes in a wide range of sparkling colours—gold, silver, pink, blue, green, and more—perfect for kids’ crafts, card making, and creative projects.

Easy to Use for Little Hands: Non-toxic, mess-free glitter glue in handy squeezy tubes with screw-top lids, ideal for children aged 3+ to enjoy hours of fun without frustration. Tip: use sparingly for faster drying
Craft Supplies: Affordable set packed in a sturdy, reusable cardboard box for storage, making it an excellent addition to kids’ craft kits or classroom activities.
Versatile for Arts & Crafts: Perfect for scrapbooking, stamping, slime-making, and decorating—encourages creativity while delivering a shiny, 3D glitter finish when dry.

Practical & Durable Design: Tubes designed for easy application, though some nozzles may require gentle squeezing or cleaning—ideal for kids’ projects, not advanced crafting, dries in 1-2 hours with thin layers
description: Product Description abeec 32 Colours Of Glitter Glue Tubes Art & Craft Supplies - Art Glitter Glue Art Supplies - The Abeec Glitter Glue Makes An Ideal Addition To Your Existing Craft Set, As Glitter Glues Are The Perfect Art Supply For Getting Extra Creative. Each Tube Within The Set Contains 10 Ml Of Glitter Glue, Meaning 320 Ml In Total Is Provided Within This Crafting Set. The Glitter Tubes Are The Perfect Pencil Case Size And Provide A Suitable Travel Activity For Kids. They Are Also Perfect For The Back To School Season Or When Making Christmas Or Halloween Decorations. 32 Assorted Colours To Choose From. Art Set For Kids 6-12 - The Abeec Glitter Glue Tubes Come In 32 Different Colours - You'll Never Run Out Of Creative Ideas With This Glitter Glue. The Glitter Tubes Also Contain Screw Top Lids Meaning Once Your Masterpiece Is Completed, You Can Keep Your Surroundings Clean. Create The Colours Of The Rainbow With These Glitter Tubes - Every Colour You Require Is In One Box. Get Creative With Glitter Glue. The Glitter Glue Make A Great Accessory For Kids Wanting To Draw, Paint Or Create - They Give Your Art Work Extra Creativity! Pair With Abeec Drawing Pads Should You Wish To Create Your Art With Glitter Glue. If You Want To Create 3d Designs, Pairing With The Abeec Craft Kits Is A Great Way To Utilise All Your Art Supplies In One - Perfect For Rainy Day Craft Sessions. abeec Glitter Glue Tubes The abeec glitter glue makes an ideal addition to your existing craft set, as glitter glues are the perfect art supply for getting extra creative. Each tube within the set contains 10 ml of glitter glue, meaning 320 ml in total is provided within this crafting set. The glitter tubes are the perfect pencil case size and provide a suitable travel activity for kids. They are also perfect for the back to school season or when making Christmas or Halloween decorations. 32 Assorted Colours to Choose From The abeec glitter glue tubes come in 32 different colours - you'll never run out of creative ideas with this glitter glue. The glitter tubes also contain screw top lids meaning once your masterpiece is completed, you can keep your surroundings clean. Create the colours of the rainbow with these glitter tubes - every colour you require is in one box. Get Creative With Glitter Glue The glitter glue make a great accessory for kids wanting to draw, paint or create - they give your art work extra creativity! Pair with abeec drawing pads should you wish to create your art with glitter glue. If you want to create 3D designs, pairing with the abeec craft kits is a great way to utilise all your art supplies in one - perfect for rainy day craft sessions. Glitter Glue Pens By abeec Brand abeec Manufacturer RMS International Limited Measurements 8 cm x 8.5 cm x 10.5 cm Weight 400 g Contents Include 32 x Assorted Glitter Glues Age Specification 3 +
